overview: In a retrofuturistic town where steam powered robots do most of the work, the young genius inventor Plato discovers a new type of fuel — plasma. He needs plasma only to achieve his dream of winning the international air race, but when his invention gets stolen, Plato has to redefine what’s truly important. Together with his faithful assistant dog Tailspin and inventor Aglaya, the brave pilot will have to find the thief, claim the rights to his invention, and win the race at any cost!
title: The Great Race
